reviewtext: I DJ all the time and I needed something that I felt would not steer me wrong. So these are the headphones that were recomended to me from a friend who is a dj also. I can turn and fold in about any direction you think of, and gives you a great quality of sound at the same time. I dont think I'd be able to get the same satifaction with any other headphones. I mean, what else can I ask for?!
